title: Monkey Business 101
description: In Monkey Economics, bananas are the gold standard. Stock market? More like banana market!

title: The Great Banana Heist
description: Two monkeys masterminded a banana heist. Their escape vehicle? A tricycle. The loot? Peels of laughter.

title: Monkey Yoga Class
description: Monkeys tried yoga today. Pose of the day? Banana split. Downward dog? More like downward monkey!

title: High-Flying Tails
description: Monkeys launched a space mission. Their spaceship? A giant banana. Mission goal? To find the cheese moon.

title: The Tailor-Made Tail
description: Fashionista monkeys opened a boutique. Top seller? Curly tail extensions. Because straight tails are so last season.

title: Monkey's Culinary Adventure
description: Chef Monkey's special dish? Banana stew. Secret ingredient? More bananas. Critics call it 'un-peel-lievably good!'

title: The Monkey Detective
description: Sherlock Holmes? Meet Sherlock Hominoidea. His first case? The Mystery of the Missing Bananas.

title: Monkeys' Mischief Night
description: During Mischief Night, monkeys swapped all zoo signs. The result? Utter confusion and laughing hyenas.

title: The Great Monkey Debate
description: The hot topic in Monkey Parliament? Should banana peels be used for renewable energy. Opposition? Slippery when wet.

title: Monkey's Day Out
description: A monkey visited the city. His review? Not enough trees, too many cars, and where are all the bananas?

title: Monkey Superheroes
description: In a world of monkey superheroes, their power? Banana vision. Their weakness? Never-ending peel clean-up duty.
